front.title: Reference Integrity Measurement Extension for Concise Software Identities

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology

abstract.t: This document specifies the CDDL and usage description for Reference Integrity Measurements (RIM) in Remote Attestation Procedures (RATS). The specification is based on Concise Software Identification (CoSWID) and TCG Reference Integrity Manifest Information Model - based on Host Integrity at Runtime and Start-up (HIRS). Extension points defined in CoSWID used to augment CoSWID tags with new attributes that can express the TCG Reference Integrity Manifest extensions.
